compatibility.notes: The Qhull license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Retain copyright notices in all files.
Distribute the license text with redistributions.
Provide notice of availability of original source code for modified versions.
license.name: Qhull
obligations: All copyright notices must remain intact in all files.
A copy of the license text must be distributed with any copies of Qhull that are redistributed.
If modified, a notice must be included with the name of the modifier, date of modification, and reason for modification.
When distributing modified versions, notice must be provided that the original source code is available.
